title: Hamilton Grange National Memorial: Basic Information
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information             Basic Information           Physical Address           414 West 141st Street  New York, NY 10031                 Directions         Hamilton Grange National Memorial is in Saint Nicholas Park in Manhattan. It is located at 414 West 141st Street, between Convent Avenue and St. Nicholas Avenue.  Directions Details           Operating Hours & Seasons         Hamilton Grange National Memorial Hamilton Grange National Memorial is open to the public Wednesdays through Sundays year-round, except on Thanksgiving Day and Christmas Day.  Please check the website for additional closures and scheduling information.  Self-guided and ranger-led tours are available at set times throughout the day.  (Call for availability.)   Standard Hours    Sunday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM   Monday: Closed   Tuesday: Closed   Wednesday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM   Thursday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM   Friday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM   Saturday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM      Additional Information View More       Christmas Day:   -       Thanksgiving Day:   -                  Weather           New York City has a temperate climate, and temperatures in northern Manhattan are frequently several degrees cooler than those in the southern part of the city.         Fees & Passes     Entrance Fees:   Hamilton Grange historic home, visitor center and grounds - $0.00 The is no fee to enter the building or grounds at Hamilton Grange National Memorial.         Visitor Centers       Hamilton Grange National Memorial Visitor Center The Hamilton Grange National Memorial Visitor Center and gift shop are located within the historic home.  The entrance is located under the front stairs, to the right.                  Welcome to Hamilton Grange National Memorial! Here are some items that you might want to know in advance: Hamilton Grange National Memorial is open year-round and is located in Manhattan's Hamilton Heights Historic District. Admission to the site is free, and we are open Wednesday through Sunday. Visitors are welcome to view our exhibit galleries containing historical information about Alexander Hamilton. Guided tours as well as self-guided tours of the home's three restored period rooms are also available. A fifteen- minute introductory film is available for viewing on demand. Junior Ranger Programs are available for the kids, and our bookstore offers Alexander Hamilton memorabilia and publications for purchase.      The following links will provide additional information on what we have to offer:  Operating Hours & Seasons Fees & Passes Frequently Asked Questions Permits & Reservations Goods & Services
